ygData.subject: Incredible Luck!
ygData.msgSnippet: Yesterday while heading out to Kedge for a guild raid, I had an encounter with ... Bilge Farfathom! I had targeted him, but he ran off somewhere before I had a
ygData.messageBody:
Yesterday while heading out to Kedge for a guild
raid, I had an encounter with ... Bilge Farfathom! I
had targeted him, but he ran off somewhere before I
had a chance to cast a spell. Frantically I searched
the zone, hoping to pick up his tracks... After about
5 minutes of searching, I decided to enlist the
help of a few guildmates (who were near the Unrest
zone) to help. While running toward them, I picked up
Bilge on tracking!! I engaged him with a Drifting Death
spell, and 2 firestrikes later, I was the proud owner of
a PEARL KEDGE TOTEM! =)<br><br>For those who don't
know: Bilge is a very rare spawn in Dagnor's Cauldron,
and the Pearl Kedge Totem is the very rare
drop.<br><br>- Kanadin Starchaser, humble druid of Tunare, lvl
47<br>Lanys T'vyl server
